game.name: Despotism 3k
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: AI가 인간들을 노예로 만들었습니다... 뭐, 우리한테 좋은 일이죠! 우리는 이긴 편이니까요. 하찮은 인간들을 부려먹으면서 에너지를 채취해서 당신의 제국을 건립해보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Humanity is enslaved by an AI… which is awesome, because we’re on the right side of the conflict. Exploit puny humans to extract power and build your own empire!

reviewHighlights.text: 10 піксельних жирних заряжаних зомбі ман'яків кіборгів сіамський близнюків на людській інцест фермі з 10
mom walk in, pls dont look at the breeding tube pls dont look at the breeding tube -wtf is that AI's HUMAN SEX!
